perks.name: Jump Pack Mastery
perks.desc: Increases jump pack fuel capacity and regeneration rate.

perks.name: Aerial Superiority
perks.desc: Gain damage reduction while airborne.

perks.name: Shock Assault
perks.desc: Ground slam creates an electrical shockwave.

perks.name: Berserker Rage
perks.desc: Low health increases attack speed dramatically.

perks.name: Thunder Hammer Expertise
perks.desc: Increases thunder hammer damage and stagger potential.

perks.name: Chainsword Mastery
perks.desc: Improves chainsword attack speed and critical hit chance.

perks.name: Power Fist Training
perks.desc: Improved power fist damage and combo potential.

perks.name: Combat Expertise
perks.desc: Enhanced melee combat effectiveness.

perks.name: Rally Cry
perks.desc: Nearby allies gain temporary damage boost after your kills.

perks.name: Protective Aura
perks.desc: Allies near you take reduced damage.

perks.name: Battle Cry
perks.desc: Your war cries inspire nearby allies.

perks.name: Guardian Spirit
perks.desc: Protect allies with enhanced defensive abilities.

perks.name: Pack Leader
perks.desc: Your melee kills restore stamina to nearby allies.

perks.name: Shared Fury
perks.desc: Critical hits grant fury to all team members.

perks.name: Tactical Coordination
perks.desc: Improved team coordination and communication.

perks.name: Squad Synergy
perks.desc: Enhanced effectiveness when fighting alongside allies.

prestige.name: I
prestige.desc: Mastery Perk I - Enhanced combat effectiveness.

prestige.name: II
prestige.desc: Mastery Perk II - Improved tactical awareness.

perks.name: Shield Mastery
perks.desc: Increases shield durability and regeneration speed.

perks.name: Fortress Stance
perks.desc: Blocking grants damage reduction to nearby allies.

perks.name: Power Sword Expertise
perks.desc: Power sword attacks have increased armor penetration.

perks.name: Shield Bash Mastery
perks.desc: Shield bashes stun enemies for longer duration.

perks.name: Banner Bearer
perks.desc: Chapter banner provides area-wide buffs to allies.

perks.name: Stalwart Defender
perks.desc: Taking damage while blocking builds up a damage bonus.

perks.name: Aegis Protocol
perks.desc: Allies behind your shield take no damage from ranged attacks.

perks.name: Guardian Aura
perks.desc: Nearby allies gain increased health regeneration.

perks.name: Inspiring Presence
perks.desc: Your defensive actions inspire allies, reducing their cooldowns.

perks.name: Tactical Advance
perks.desc: Team gains movement speed when following behind you.

prestige.name: Immovable Object
prestige.desc: Cannot be knocked down or moved while blocking.

prestige.name: Retribution
prestige.desc: Blocking attacks charges up a powerful counterattack.

prestige.name: Shield Wall
prestige.desc: Multiple Bulwarks can link shields for enhanced protection.

prestige.name: Fortress of Will
prestige.desc: Low health grants massive damage resistance.

prestige.name: Righteous Fury
prestige.desc: Ally deaths near you grant temporary invincibility.

prestige.name: Chapter's Pride
prestige.desc: Banner effects persist even after banner is destroyed.

prestige.name: Stalwart Advance
prestige.desc: Can move at full speed while blocking.

prestige.name: Divine Protection
prestige.desc: Shield regenerates faster when protecting allies.

perks.name: Bolter Discipline
perks.desc: Improved accuracy and reduced recoil with bolter weapons.

perks.name: Marksman Training
perks.desc: Headshots deal significantly increased damage.

perks.name: Grenade Expertise
perks.desc: Carry additional grenades and increased blast radius.

perks.name: Tactical Reload
perks.desc: Faster reload speeds and reduced reload penalties.

perks.name: Combat Stims
perks.desc: Medicae stims provide temporary combat bonuses.

perks.name: Battlefield Awareness
perks.desc: Enhanced radar range and enemy detection.

perks.name: Field Medic
perks.desc: Revive allies faster and they return with more health.

perks.name: Ammunition Supply
perks.desc: Allies near you regenerate ammunition over time.

perks.name: Squad Leader
perks.desc: Your kills reduce ability cooldowns for all team members.

perks.name: Covering Fire
perks.desc: Suppressing enemies grants damage bonus to allies.

prestige.name: Precision Strike
prestige.desc: Perfect accuracy shots ignore armor completely.

prestige.name: Explosive Ordinance
prestige.desc: Grenades have a chance to spawn additional explosions.

prestige.name: Combat Medic
prestige.desc: Can revive allies at range with medicae darts.

prestige.name: Suppression Master
prestige.desc: Suppressed enemies take damage over time.

prestige.name: Adaptive Tactics
prestige.desc: Gain different bonuses based on current weapon type.

prestige.name: Overwatch
prestige.desc: Standing still increases damage and accuracy over time.

prestige.name: Field Commander
prestige.desc: Can mark targets for the entire team to focus fire.

prestige.name: Emergency Protocol
prestige.desc: Low team health activates powerful team-wide buffs.

perks.name: Heavy Weapons Training
perks.desc: Reduced recoil and faster handling of heavy weapons.

perks.name: Siege Specialist
perks.desc: Increased damage against armored and large enemies.

perks.name: Plasma Mastery
perks.desc: Plasma weapons charge faster and overheat less.

perks.name: Multi-Melta Expertise
perks.desc: Multi-melta has increased range and penetration.

perks.name: Iron Halo
perks.desc: Deployable shield generator provides area protection.

perks.name: Sustained Fire
perks.desc: Continuous firing increases damage and accuracy.

perks.name: Suppressing Fire
perks.desc: Heavy weapons suppress large areas, slowing enemies.

perks.name: Overwatch Support
perks.desc: Provides covering fire that protects advancing allies.

perks.name: Defensive Position
perks.desc: Creates fortified positions that boost team defense.

perks.name: Artillery Strike
perks.desc: Can call in devastating orbital bombardments.

prestige.name: Walking Fortress
prestige.desc: Movement speed is unaffected by heavy weapon penalties.

prestige.name: Plasma Storm
prestige.desc: Overcharged plasma weapons create area damage.

prestige.name: Bunker Buster
prestige.desc: Heavy weapons can destroy cover and fortifications.

prestige.name: Endless Ammunition
prestige.desc: Sustained fire gradually increases magazine capacity.

prestige.name: Orbital Support
prestige.desc: Reduced cooldown on all bombardment abilities.

prestige.name: Armor Piercing
prestige.desc: All weapons gain increased armor penetration.

prestige.name: Suppression Zone
prestige.desc: Creates persistent areas that slow and damage enemies.

prestige.name: Maximum Firepower
prestige.desc: Can fire all weapons simultaneously for short bursts.

perks.name: Long Range Mastery
perks.desc: Increased damage and accuracy at long distances.

perks.name: Stealth Training
perks.desc: Enhanced camo cloak duration and effectiveness.

perks.name: Precision Targeting
perks.desc: Can target specific enemy weak points for massive damage.

perks.name: Explosive Rounds
perks.desc: Sniper rounds create small explosions on impact.

perks.name: Infiltrator
perks.desc: Can move through enemy lines undetected.

perks.name: Overwatch Specialist
perks.desc: Stationary position grants increasing damage bonuses.

perks.name: Scout Network
perks.desc: Reveals enemy positions to the entire team.

perks.name: Target Designation
perks.desc: Marked enemies take increased damage from all sources.

perks.name: Guardian Angel
perks.desc: Can eliminate threats targeting distant allies.

perks.name: Battlefield Control
perks.desc: Sniper shots can pin down multiple enemies.

prestige.name: One Shot, One Kill
prestige.desc: Perfect headshots instantly kill most enemies.

prestige.name: Ghost Walker
prestige.desc: Movement doesn't break camo cloak.

prestige.name: Penetrating Shot
prestige.desc: Sniper rounds can hit multiple enemies in a line.

prestige.name: Eagle Eye
prestige.desc: Can see and target enemies through walls.

prestige.name: Phantom Protocol
prestige.desc: Killing enemies while cloaked extends cloak duration.

prestige.name: Spotter Network
prestige.desc: Team members can call in precision strikes.

prestige.name: Rapid Deployment
prestige.desc: Can quickly relocate between vantage points.

prestige.name: Master Marksman
prestige.desc: No bullet drop or travel time on sniper shots.

perks.name: Grapple Mastery
perks.desc: Increased grapple range and faster deployment.

perks.name: Shock Tactics
perks.desc: Surprise attacks from grappling deal bonus damage.

perks.name: Instigator Carbine
perks.desc: Improved accuracy and damage with carbine weapons.

perks.name: Combat Knife Expertise
perks.desc: Faster melee attacks and increased critical chance.

perks.name: Melta Bomb Specialist
perks.desc: Carry more melta bombs with increased blast radius.

perks.name: Hit and Run
perks.desc: Increased movement speed after successful attacks.

perks.name: Enemy Harassment
perks.desc: Your attacks reduce enemy accuracy and movement.

perks.name: Sabotage Specialist
perks.desc: Can disable enemy equipment and weapons.

perks.name: Pathfinder
perks.desc: Creates routes for allies to follow safely.

perks.name: Rapid Extraction
perks.desc: Can quickly rescue downed allies with grapple.

prestige.name: Spider's Web
prestige.desc: Can deploy multiple grapple points simultaneously.

prestige.name: Demolition Expert
prestige.desc: Explosives have dramatically increased damage radius.

prestige.name: Shadow Strike
prestige.desc: Grapple attacks from above deal critical damage.

prestige.name: Guerrilla Warfare
prestige.desc: Killing enemies while alone grants significant bonuses.

prestige.name: Escape Artist
prestige.desc: Can break free from any crowd control effect.

prestige.name: Behind Enemy Lines
prestige.desc: Gain damage bonus when surrounded by enemies.

prestige.name: Tactical Insertion
prestige.desc: Can deploy spawn beacons for team reinforcement.

prestige.name: Master Infiltrator
prestige.desc: All stealth abilities have reduced cooldowns.
